8  int Generic::runAlgorithm(const cv::Mat &input_image, const sensor_msgs::Imu &imu, nav_msgs::Odometry &odom_estimated, cv::Mat &output_image, std::string &image_encoding){
9  double start_time = ros::Time::now().toSec() ;
10  static int counter=0, state = 0;
11  cv::Mat mat;
12  bool result = false;
13 
14  switch (state){
15  // Remain in this state until camera calibration is uploaded
16  case 0: if(this->camera_calibrated_ == true){
17  this->resetParameters();
18  this->blob_.lock = false;
19  counter = 0;
20  state = 1;
21  }else
22  return -1;
23  // No break here intentionally..
24 
25  // Searching target
26  case 1: // Image pre-processing (crop and thresh)
27  this->preProcessing(input_image, mat);
28  std::cout << "duration: " << ros::Time::now().toSec() - start_time << std::endl;
29  // Landmark detection
30  result = this->segmentation(mat);
31  // Reamin in this state until a landmark is found
32  if (result == true){
33  this->blob_.lock = true;
34  state = 2;
35  }
36  break;
37 
38  // A landmark candidate has been detected
39  case 2: // ROI definition
40  this->assembleROI(100);
41  // Image pre-processing (crop and thresh)
42  this->preProcessing(input_image, mat);
43  // Landmark detection
44  result = this->segmentation(mat);
45  std::cout << "duration: " << ros::Time::now().toSec() - start_time << std::endl;
46  // Incremet counter each time a target has been correctly detected
47  if (result == true){
48  // Remain in this state until counter greater than a threshold
49  ++counter;
50  if (counter > 5){
51  // Estimate pose
52  this->poseEstimation(odom_estimated);
53  // Low pass filter (validates estimation)
54  this->lowPassFilter(odom_estimated, true);
55  state = 3;
56  }
57  } else
58  --counter;
59  break;
60 
61  // Locked stated. Run pose estimation
62  case 3: // ROI definition
63  this->assembleROI(30);
64  // Image pre-processing (crop and thresh)
65  this->preProcessing(input_image, mat);
66  std::cout << "duration: " << ros::Time::now().toSec() - start_time << std::endl;
67  // Landmark detection
68  result = this->segmentation(mat);
69  // Check if landmark detected
70  if (result == true){
71  // Estimate pose
72  this->poseEstimation(odom_estimated);
73  // Low pass filter (validates estimation)
74  result = this->lowPassFilter(odom_estimated);
75  if (result == true)
76  counter = std::min(5, counter+1);
77  else
78  --counter;
79  } else
80  --counter;
81 
82 
83  break;
84 
85 
86  }
87 
88  // Check if counter reached minimum value
89  if (counter < 0)
90  state = 0;
91 
92  // Draw ROI rectangle on output image
93  output_image = input_image.clone();
94 
95  cv::rectangle(output_image,
96  cv::Point(this->roi_.x_offset, this->roi_.y_offset), cv::Point(this->roi_.x_offset+this->roi_.width , this->roi_.y_offset+this->roi_.height ),
97  cv::Scalar( 0,255,0), 2 );
98  image_encoding = "rgb8";
99 
100 
101 
102  if (state==3 && result == true)
103  return 1;
104  else
105  return 0;
106 
107 
108  }

125  void Generic::initializeParameters(ros::NodeHandle &node){
126  Descriptor base, range;
127  // Loading parameters from a launch file
128  node.param("threshold", this->threshold_, 100);
129  node.param("min_score", this->blob_.min_score, 7);
130  node.getParam("landmark_diag", this->landmark_diag_);
131 
132  // Base descriptor parameters
133  node.getParam("base_shape", base.invariant.shape);
134  node.getParam("base_area", base.invariant.area);
135  node.getParam("base_hu", base.invariant.hu);
136 
137  // (Similarity) range descriptor parameters
138  node.getParam("range_shape", range.invariant.shape);
139  node.getParam("range_area", range.invariant.area);
140  node.getParam("range_hu", range.invariant.hu);
141 
142  this->blob_.setBase(base);
143  this->blob_.setRange(range);
144  }

149  void Generic::resetParameters(void){
150  // Reset region of interest
151  roi_.x_offset = 0;
152  roi_.y_offset = 0;
153  roi_.width = this->width_;
154  roi_.height = this->height_;
155 
156  }

163  void Generic::preProcessing(const cv::Mat &input_image, cv::Mat &output_image){
164  // Copy only region of interest
165  output_image = cv::Mat(input_image, cv::Range(this->roi_.y_offset, this->roi_.y_offset+this->roi_.height-1), cv::Range(this->roi_.x_offset, this->roi_.x_offset+this->roi_.width-1) ).clone();
166  /****************************** COLORFUL TARGET *********************************/
167  // Colorspace transform
168  //std::vector<cv::Mat> rgb;
169  //cv::split(output_image, rgb);
170  //output_image = 5*(rgb[1]-rgb[0]) + (rgb[1]-rgb[2]);
171  /***************************** BLACK AND WHITE *********************************/
172  // Colorspace transform
173  cv::cvtColor(output_image, output_image, CV_RGB2GRAY);
174  // Low pass filter
175  // cv::GaussianBlur( output_image, output_image, cv::Size( 3, 3 ), 0, 0);
176  // Gray to black and wgite
177  // cv::threshold(output_image, output_image, this->threshold_, 255, cv::THRESH_BINARY_INV);
178 
179 
180  int r = output_image.rows;
181  int c = output_image.cols;
182 
183  int n = this->roi_.width/150 + 2;//std::ceil(2.0*this->roi_.width)/(this->width_) + 2;
184  std::cout << "n: " << n << std::endl;
185  int qr = r/n;
186  int qc = c/n;
187  for (int w = 0; w<n; w++){
188  for (int k = 0; k< n; k++){
189  int sum =0 ;
190  for (int i=w*qr; i<(w+1)*qr; ++i){
191  for (int j=k*qc; j<(k+1)*qc; ++j){
192  sum += output_image.at<uchar>(i,j);
193  }
194  }
195 
196  int average = sum/(qr*qc) - 20;
197  // std::cout << "val " << w << ": " << average << std::endl;
198 
199  for (int i=w*qr; i<(w+1)*qr; ++i){
200  for (int j=k*qc; j<(k+1)*qc; ++j){
201  if (output_image.at<uchar>(i,j) > average ){
202  output_image.at<uchar>(i,j) = 0;
203  } else{
204  output_image.at<uchar>(i,j) = 255;
205  }
206  }
207  }
208  }
209  }

212  }

218  bool Generic::segmentation(const cv::Mat &input_image){
219 
220  std::vector<std::vector<cv::Point> > contours;
221  std::vector<cv::Vec4i> hierarchy;
222  cv::Mat mat = input_image.clone();
223 
224  // Contours
225  cv::findContours( mat, contours, hierarchy, CV_RETR_EXTERNAL, CV_CHAIN_APPROX_NONE, cv::Point(this->roi_.x_offset, this->roi_.y_offset) );
226  // Landmark detection
227  int result = this->blob_.detect(contours, this->descriptor);
228 
229  // If result is geq to zero, then a landmark has been detected
230  if (result >= 0)
231  return true;
232  else
233  return false;
234 
235  }

242  void Generic::poseEstimation(nav_msgs::Odometry &odom_estimated){
243  double height;
244 
245  // Estimate height
246  height = 0.5*( this->landmark_diag_) / std::sqrt(
247  pow((this->descriptor.dynamic.radius)*cos(this->descriptor.dynamic.theta)/this->fx_,2) +
248  pow((this->descriptor.dynamic.radius)*sin(this->descriptor.dynamic.theta)/this->fy_,2)
249  ) ;
250 
251  // Estima translation
252  odom_estimated.pose.pose.position.x = height*(this->descriptor.dynamic.uc - this->cx_)/this->fx_;
253  odom_estimated.pose.pose.position.y = height*(this->descriptor.dynamic.vc - this->cy_)/this->fy_;
254  odom_estimated.pose.pose.position.z = height;
255 
256  odom_estimated.pose.pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(0, 0, this->descriptor.dynamic.theta );
257 
258  // return true;
259  };
260 
265  void Generic::assembleROI(const int size){
266  int span = std::max(size, (int) (2*this->descriptor.dynamic.radius) );
267  this->roi_.x_offset = std::max(0, (int) this->descriptor.dynamic.uc - span);
268  this->roi_.y_offset = std::max(0, (int) this->descriptor.dynamic.vc - span);
269  this->roi_.height = std::min( (int) (this->height_ - this->roi_.y_offset), 2*span);
270  this->roi_.width = std::min( (int) (this->width_ - this->roi_.x_offset), 2*span);
271  }
272 
279  bool Generic::lowPassFilter(nav_msgs::Odometry &odom_estimated, bool initialize){
280  static geometry_msgs::PointStamped previous_estimation;
281 
282  if (initialize == true){
283  previous_estimation.point = odom_estimated.pose.pose.position;
284  previous_estimation.header.stamp = odom_estimated.header.stamp;
285  return true;
286  }
287 
288  // Time interval between estimation
289  double dt = 0.001*(0.001*(0.001*(odom_estimated.header.stamp.nsec - previous_estimation.header.stamp.nsec))) + (odom_estimated.header.stamp.sec - previous_estimation.header.stamp.sec);
290 
291  // Average velocity during dt
292  double dx = std::abs(odom_estimated.pose.pose.position.x - previous_estimation.point.x)/dt ;
293  double dy = std::abs(odom_estimated.pose.pose.position.y - previous_estimation.point.y)/dt ;
294  double dz = std::abs(odom_estimated.pose.pose.position.z - previous_estimation.point.z)/dt ;
295 
296  // Check if estimated speeds are within a threshold
297  if (dx > 1 || dy > 1 || dz > 1)
298  return false;
299 
300  // Update previous value
301  previous_estimation.point = odom_estimated.pose.pose.position;
302  previous_estimation.header.stamp = odom_estimated.header.stamp;
303  return true;
304  }
